company.name: TECH Hub
company.tagline: Innovative Software Solutions for Modern Businesses
company.description: TECH Hub is a leading software house specializing in custom software development, cloud solutions, and digital transformation services.

hero.title: Transform Your Business with Cutting-Edge Software
hero.tagline: We deliver innovative technology solutions that drive growth and efficiency for businesses worldwide

introduction.title: Welcome to TECH Hub
introduction.content: We are a forward-thinking software development company committed to delivering exceptional digital solutions. With expertise spanning web development, mobile applications, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise systems, we transform complex business challenges into elegant software solutions.

news.title: TECH Hub Wins Tech Innovation Award 2026
news.excerpt: We're proud to announce that TECH Hub has been recognized as the leading innovator in enterprise software solutions at the Global Tech Awards 2026.

news.title: Launching AI-Powered Development Tools
news.excerpt: Introducing our new suite of AI-enhanced development tools that accelerate software delivery by 40%.

news.title: New Partnership with Global Tech Giants
news.excerpt: TECH Hub announces strategic partnerships with leading technology companies.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
cta.description: Let's collaborate to bring your vision to life with innovative technology solutions

overview.title: Building Tomorrow's Technology Today
overview.content: Founded with a vision to revolutionize how businesses leverage technology, TECH Hub has grown into a trusted partner for organizations seeking digital transformation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower businesses through innovative software solutions that drive efficiency, growth, and competitive advantage.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be recognized globally as a leading software house that sets the standard for quality, innovation, and client satisfaction.

intro.title: Driving Innovation Through Research
intro.content: Our Research & Development division focuses on exploring emerging technologies, building experimental systems, and transforming ideas into real-world solutions.

focus.title: Artificial Intelligence
focus.description: Machine learning, computer vision, NLP, and applied AI research

focus.title: Cloud & Distributed Systems
focus.description: Scalable cloud-native architectures and high-availability systems

focus.title: Cybersecurity
focus.description: Security automation, threat detection, and zero-trust models

projects.name: AI Code Assistant
projects.description: An internal AI-powered assistant to accelerate software development

projects.name: Smart Infrastructure Platform
projects.description: Researching scalable infrastructure monitoring using AI

cta.title: Interested in Collaborating?
cta.description: We welcome research partnerships, academic collaboration, and innovation-driven projects.
